basics.name: Johan Lindell
basics.label: Software Engineer
basics.summary: Experienced software engineer with over 15 years of expertise in developing digital products. Passionate about creating seamless user experiences and optimizing technological solutions. Holding a Master's degree in Computer Science. I am currently contributing at Google, enhancing user confidence in video conferencing through improved setups and troubleshooting guidance.

work.summary: Contributed to innovation in video conferencing by enhancing user confidence through guided setups and troubleshooting tools. Later focused on improving media delivery using WebRTC and other technologies.

Led a team in expanding Lendo into new markets while developing a scalable, configurable platform to support future expansions. Successfully launched Lendo in Spain in 2020 and continued optimizing platform performance and adaptability for further market entries.
Enhanced the newly launched platform by developing new features and ensuring modularity for future market expansions.
Provided IT consultancy services, leading key development initiatives for various clients.

assignments.summary: Played a key role in launching a new platform by developing features and ensuring modularity through a microservice-architecture to support future market expansions. Served as the primary consultant for Lendo's new business loan product, leading its development alongside the new platform.

Worked on both front-end and back-end development, improving existing webshops and creating new ones. Led the implementation of a full redesign for Sweden’s leading salad bar company (shop.picadeli.se) and spearheaded the launch of a new webshop for the luxury clothing retailer (savannahs.com)

work.summary: Managed and maintained computer labs with approximately 100 workstations, ensuring seamless system operation through Active Directory and Linux server administration.

opensource.name: multi-gitter
opensource.summary: Developed multi-gitter, a powerful open-source tool for making simultaneous changes across multiple repositories, automating pull requests, and streamlining bulk updates for developers worldwide. Confirmed to be used by multiple Fortune 500 companies and even used by GitHub themselves.

opensource.name: JsBarcode
opensource.summary: Developed JsBarcode, the most widely used barcode generation library on GitHub, serving millions of users globally.
